name: Time/Use Limit Item
author: Alucard648
info: Time and Use count limited items. Made on request by SkyFlare.
description: 2 item scripts and global one for setting up limited items. First one is use count limit, like sword sharpening in Majora`s Mask. Item disappears from Link`s inventory after it was used certain number of times. The second one is time limited item that disappears from Link`s inventory after certain time since pickup.
setup: Use count Limit.1. Assign SetItemLimit into OnPickUp item script2. Assign UpdateItemDurability into OnAction item script//D0 - Global RAM Array index. Must be unique per limited item.//D1 - Use count limit.//D2 - Sound to play, when item expires.//D3 - Message string to display, when item expires.Time Limit1. Assign SetItemLimit into OnPickUp item script2. Global Script combining: insert UpdateItemTimer function with item ID matching it into UpdateTimeLimitItems function3. Global Script combining: put UpdateTimeLimitItems() into main loop of Active global script//D0 - Global RAM Array index. Must be unique per limited item.//D1 - Time limit, in seconds//D2 - Sound to play, when item expires.//D3 - Message string to display, when item expires.
